author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 50-year-old Dalit, A. Chinna Karuppiah, was hacked to death at Odaipatti under Karuppayoorani police station limits on Thursday evening.

The police said that an unidentified gang waylaid him near the village along Madurai-Sivaganga Road and hacked him to death around 3.30 p.m.

The police have picked up three persons in this connection.

The deceased had complained against some local people for having encroached upon government poromboke land, and the police suspect that it could have led to the murder.

The body has been kept at Government Rajaji Hospital.

Police force has been deployed at the village as a precautionary measure.
title: Man hacked to death
